create an IPC face and a forwarding entry to send interest packets to a listener in the main thread

Name Type Description

announcer(firstData)

settable announce function. Rather than enforce a handshake naming convention/protocol it is up to application developer convention to negotiate storage request handshakes. This function is called within {IO.publish} after the data is in the contentStore
Parameters:
Name Type Description
firstData Object the ndn.Data object of the first segment data packet
Source:
  • IO.js, line 80

Name Type Description

fetchAllSegments(firstSegmentInterest, onEachData, onTimeout)

fetch all segments of any data, excecuting the callback with each packet
Parameters:
Name Type Description
firstSegmentInterest Interest the interest for the first segment of a data item
onEachData function function to call with each incoming data packet, recieves the raw packet, the ndn.Data object, and the finalBlockID of the item
onTimeout function function to call if the entire object can't be retrieved, passed the firstSegmentInterest as the only argument
Source:
  • IO.js, line 140

Name Type Description
